articles.author: Aman Gupta
articles.title: Russian President Vladimir Putin to skip BRICS summit in South Africa due to arrest threat. Details here | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin will not attend the BRICS summit in South Africa next month. He will join the summit virtually, while other leaders will attend in person.
